name: IDOListic
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE!!! Please maximise the window, or you won't see the tutorial text!!!

You are a panic prone explorer who has a thirst for shiny golden treasures.

The trouble is, whenever you pick up one of these treasures, the room seems to be lined with traps. And whenever you see traps, you LOSE CONTROL of yourself, and scramble for the exit the same way you entered.

In IDOListic the player is constantly drawing a path right up until they touch the goal. Then, you lose control of the player character, and the traps appear. The character follows the path you drew for them in reverse!

IMPORTANT NOTE!!! Please maximise the window, or you won't see the tutorial text!!!
